mapper.select: Select * from (SELECT test.time1 as timestamp,test.key30 as rrc,test.key58 as upprb,test.key59 as downprb FROM test_rtdata_net test WHERE test.time1 order by test.time1 DESC limit 288) as counts order by timestamp;

Select * from (SELECT test.time1 as timestamp,test.key32 as UECounts,test.key33 as PUCCH,test.key45 as CCE,test.key48 as PUSCHPRB,test.key54 as uprealprb FROM test_rtdata_net test WHERE test.time1 order by test.time1 DESC limit 288) as counts order by timestamp;
Select * from (SELECT test.time1 as timestamp,test.key26 as yymon,test.key27 as yysucces FROM test_rtdata_net test WHERE test.time1 order by test.time1 DESC limit 288) as counts order by timestamp;
Select * from (SELECT test.time1 as timestamp,test.key17 as yyrrc,test.key21 as yywire FROM test_rtdata_net test WHERE test.time1 order by test.time1 DESC limit 288) as counts order by timestamp;
